summary: Two married couples have their twelve-year bond of friendship put to the test when one couple reveals that they are splitting up.
cast: Dennis Quaid|Andie MacDowell|Greg Kinnear|Toni Collette|Taylor Emerson|Jake Fritz|Holliston Coleman|Angus T. Jones|Beau Holden|Dina Morrone|Ruth Reichl|Romulo Yanes|Greg Bronson|Caroline Neville
title: Cena entre amigos
